channel.title: Trophy Dark: Dice Pools and Devils Bargains
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog Michael Van Vleet looks at the key elements of Trophy Dark: story creation through Risk rolls, dice pool creation, and how to offer (or accept) a Devil's Bargain.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/trophy-dark-dice-pools-and-devils-bargains
